thread.title: Poor form: Raja fans abuse Yakubu Mohammed on Facebook
thread.title_full: Poor form: Raja fans abuse Yakubu Mohammed on Facebook

title: Poor form: Raja fans abuse Yakubu Mohammed on Facebook
text:
Sports News | 13 October 2015 21:11 CET Poor form: Raja fans abuse Yakubu Mohammed on Facebook - www.allsports.com.gh 
Former Ashantigold hitman, Yakubu Mohammed is only four league games into his Raja Casablanca career but already the Ghanaian is feeling the heat of poor form in Morocco. 
27 year old Yakubu signed a 3-year deal with Raja even before the Ghana Premier League season ended, his 11 goals in 24 games helping the Obuasi club to a first league title in 19 years. 
But it's not been that easy in Morroco where his strike in the 1-1 draw at Kawkab Marrakech on September 12 is the only goal Yakubu has netted for the Casablanca giants. 
Last Saturday's 0-1 home defeat to also struggling KAC Kenitra was the final straw as irate fans of the former Africa champions turned their ire on the Ghanaian striker on social media and rained all kinds of verbal attacks on the player who signed for them barely two months ago. play
